amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate on the lives saved by the Common Remotely Operated Weapons Station (CROWS) platform.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2569 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2569 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Salazar. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12790) To express the sense of the Senate on the lives saved by the Common Remotely Operated Weapons Station (CROWS) platform.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2569 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2569 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Salazar.
